title: Lifeboat Steering Simulation-Based Training and Skill Transfer Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic maritime safety procedures and theoretical knowledge of lifeboat operations
context.additional_context: Enhancement of technical proficiency and situational response capabilities via simulation training for real maritime emergency scenarios

learning_goals: Successfully perform safe steering techniques according to standard emergency procedures as a lifeboat coxswain in a simulation environment three consecutive times.
Apply skills acquired in the training environment to various virtual emergency scenarios (e.g., adverse weather, equipment failure).
Achieve over 90% collaboration efficiency during simulation-based maritime rescue operations through teamwork.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
